page.title: 07PLAYGROUND GAMES (SEVENS)
page.content: This is a catching game played with a ball, by one person. 1. Throw the ball against a wall and catch it without letting it bounce- do this 7 times. 2. Throw it in the air, let it bounce once and catch it- do this 6 times. 3. Bounce the ball on the ground 5 times. 4. Throw the ball under your leg, against the wall and catch it- do this 4 times. 5.Throw the ball so it hits the ground and the wall, then catch it-do this 3 times. 6. Bounce the ball on the ground twice, hit it against the wall and catch it. 7.Throw the ball in the air, make a complete turn and catch it. This game gives much ENTERTAINMENT to children.
